OaIneligibleToEarnCreditMessage: Ineligible to accrue mileage or Premier qualifying credit.
ChangeFeeDisclaimerText: Change fee estimate is based on rescheduled travel between the same cities. Actual fee may vary.
FFC_Policy_Info: A travel waiver is in effect for your reservation. Read the details of the waiver to see if fees may be waived for any changes made to your reservation.
NoSegmentsFoundErrorMessage: Your itinerary cannot be retrieved, since there are no flight segments.
EarnedMilesText: Award miles shown are the miles that can be earned for this flight. Mileage accrued will vary depending on the terms and conditions of your frequent flyer program. United MileagePlus mileage accrual and other benefits of MileagePlus associated with air travel are subject to the rules of the MileagePlus program.\n\nYou can earn up to 75,000 award miles per ticket. The 75,000 award miles cap may be applied to your posted flight activity in an order different than shown.
FareLockMessage: The reservation is currently on hold with a {0}-day FareLock℠.
SSR_OA_MessageNew: Please contact {0} to complete your special request.
otfConversionAlert: To book new flights with credit select "Change flights" below.
PNRScheduleChangeKeeptrip: This updated itinerary works for you without any additional changes. You can still make changes or cancel later.
PNRScheduleChangeContentC:
If the changes don't work for you, you may have the option to cancel your flight and request a refund. Learn more about our schedule change policies.

Please review the options below and select one before continuing, or contact United Customer Service to see if other options are available:
PNRScheduleChangeContentB:
Most schedule changes are minor, but if the changes don't work for you, we'll do our best to find you a new flight. Learn more about our schedule change policies.

Please review the options below and select one before continuing:
PNRScheduleChangeContentA:
Most schedule changes are minor, but if the changes don't work for you, other options may be available. Learn more about our schedule change policies.

If you booked this trip through a travel agency, a travel website or an airline other than United, you should contact them for assistance with your reservation.
PNRPSSAScheduleChangeAlert: A schedule change has impacted your trip, Which means the details of one or more of the flights in your itinerary have changed. The changes to your trip are indicated below.<br/><br/>Most schedule changes are minor, but if the changes don't work for you, other options may be available through your employee pass travel tools.
MRTravelWaiverHdr: A travel waiver is in effect for this trip.
MRTravelWaiverDesc: We're waiving change fees when you rebook your travel.
MRTravelWaiverAltDtRngHdr: If you decide to make a change to your reservation, change fees and any difference in ticket price will be waived if the change you make follows these guidelines:
MRTravelWaiverDiffDate: Your new travel date is between {0} and {1}
MRTravelWaiverBfrAftrDate: Your new travel date is not more than {0} day{1} before or {2} day{3} after the original date
MRTravelWaiverSameAirport: Your origin and destination airports remain the same
MRTravelWaiverDiffAirport: Your origin or destination is changed to one of the following airports:{0},{1}
MRTravelWaiverSameCabin: Your new ticket is in the same cabin as the original ticket
MRTravelWaiverOperatedByUA: Your new flight is operated by United or United Express
MRTravelWaiverAircraftType: Your new flight is not on one of the following aircraft type(s): {0}
MRTravelWaiverCfAltDteRangeHdr: If you decide to make a change to your reservation, change fees will  be waived (but any difference in ticket price may apply) if the change you make follows these guidelines:
MRTravelWaiverChngByDtHdr: Qualify for this travel waiver by either:
MRTravelWaiverChngByDtDesc: Changing your flight before your current departure date by selecting "Change flight".
MRTravelWaiverChngRebookLtr: Canceling your flight before your current departure date by selecting "Cancel flight". If you cancel, you'll get a travel credit you can use to book a new trip that must start on or before {0}.
MRTravelWaiverChngByDtDefaultContent: Canceling your flight before your current departure date by selecting "Cancel flight".
MRTravelWaiverMoreThanOne: More than one travel waiver is in effect for your trip. You can find the details for all active travel waivers on the Important Notices page.
MRTravelWaiverFootr: Changes made outside of these guidelines will be subject to the rules of the fare purchased.
FFC_AGENCY_ALRTMSG: This ticket was booked through a third party agency. Unless authorized, please contact your original ticketing agency to rebook. Future Flight Credits/Unused tickets are subject to audit for policy compliance.
RESHOP_JSE_NONCHANGEABLE_INSIDE24HRS: header|Free cancellation available.||body|This reservation qualifies for our 24-hour flexible booking policy. If you want to change your itinerary, please cancel and rebook your ticket.
RESHOP_JSE_NONCHANGEABLE_OUTSIDE24HRS: header|This ticket cannot be changed or refunded.||body|If you cancel your flight, the cost of this ticket cannot be credited towards your original payment method or as a travel credit.
RESHOP_JSE_NONCHANGEABLE_CANCEL_OUTSIDE2: header|This ticket was not refunded.||body|When you canceled your flight, the cost of the ticket wasn't credited towards your original payment method or as a travel credit.
ResDtlSCOneTimeChangeCancel_Content: This trip is eligible for a free one-time change or refund.||Because of a prior schedule change impacting your trip, you can make a limited one-time change to your flight for free.||Change your flight||View cancel and refund options
ResDtlSCOneTimeChange_Content: This trip is eligible for a free one-time change.||Because of a prior schedule change impacting your trip, you can make a limited one-time change to your flight for free.||Change your flight||View cancel options
ResDtlSCOneTimeChange: This trip is eligible for a free one-time change.||Due to a prior schedule change impacting your trip, you have the option to make a one-time change to your flight(s) at no cost.<br/><br/>Your new flight must meet these conditions:<ul><li>Your new travel date is not more than 1 day before or 1 day after the original date</li><li> Your origin and destination airports remain the same</li><li>Your new ticket is in the same cabin and booking class as the original ticket</li><li> Your new flight is operated by United and United Express</li></ul>Select "Change flight" below to search for new flights.
ResDtlSCOneTimeChangeCancel: This trip is eligible for a free one-time change or refund.||Due to a prior schedule change impacting your trip, you have the option to make a one-time change to your flight(s) at no cost, or cancel and request a refund.<br/><br/>Your new flight must meet these conditions:<br/><ul><li>Your new travel date is not more than 1 day before or 1 day after the original date</li><li> Your origin and destination airports remain the same</li><li>Your new ticket is in the same cabin and booking class as the original ticket</li><li> Your new flight is operated by United and United Express</li></ul>To make a one-time change, select "Change flights" below. To review cancel and refund options, select "Cancel options".
IRROPS_CHECKIN_MisconnectContent: Header|One of your flights is delayed.||Body|We’ve noticed you have a tight connection and want to provide you with more flexibility. You may keep your original itinerary or view other flights.||Alert|We’ve noticed you have a tight connection and want to provide you with more flexibility. You may keep your original itinerary or view other flights.
PerformInstantupgradesnoLongerAvailable: We're sorry. All segments are no longer available for upgrades.
emailDuplicateError: This email is already associated with another account
countDownWidgetSectionDescription: Excited about your next trip? Count the days with the new United countdown widget.
ExceptionMessageForInvalidPNROrInvalidLa: The traveler information entered does not match our record. Please revise the traveler’s name, the account number, or both.
countDownWidgetInstructionPageContentiOS: <p><b>How to add the widget to your home screen on iOS:</b></p><p>1. On your home screen, touch anywhere on the screen and hold until your apps start to shake.</p><p>2. Select the "+" in the top left corner.</p><p>3. Enter "United" in the search bar and select the United app.</p><p>4. Choose the widget you want and select "Add Widget."</p><p>5. Select "Done." </p>
countDownWidgetInstructionPageContentAnd: <p><b>How to add the widget to your home screen on Android:</b></p><p>1. On your home screen, touch anywhere on the screen and hold until you see the customize view window.</p><p>2. Select the “Widgets.”</p><p>3. Enter "United" in the search bar and select the United widget.</p><p>4. Choose the widget you want and select "Add."</p><p>5. Hold down on the widget to move it to wherever you want on your home screen. </p>

ShareReservationDisplayCaption: Header|Select how you want to share your information.||Body|@If you share an itinerary link, anyone with this link will be able to re-share, view or make changes to your reservation and the personal information associated with it.@@If you share itinerary details, the recipient will only be able to view your trip information.

Booking2OGenericExceptionMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
PriorityBoardingIncludedMessage: Priority Boarding is included for this flight
PriorityBoardingTermsAndConditionsList: pbTandC1|Priority Boarding is offered only for flights operated by United and United Express®, and is subject to availability.~pbTandC2|Priority Boarding benefits only apply to flights for which they are purchased.~pbTandC3|Priority Boarding may occur after certain MileagePlus Premier Members have boarded.~pbTandC4|Customers who are traveling on a Basic Economy ticket cannot purchase Priority Boarding.~pbTandC5|If you make voluntary changes to an itinerary for which you’ve purchased Priority Boarding, your Priority Boarding benefits will automatically transfer to the flights on your updated itinerary that are operated by United or United Express, if available. However, if you cancel your itinerary entirely, your Priority Boarding purchase will not be refunded.~pbTandC6|For flight cancellations or involuntary schedule changes, we will transfer Priority Boarding to the new itinerary. If requested prior to flight to which Priority Boarding has been transferred, Priority Boarding for canceled flights will be refunded.~pbTandC7|Priority Boarding does not exempt passengers from check-in time limits.~pbTandC8|When available, you can purchase Priority Boarding for multiple people on your reservation. Priority Boarding must be purchased for each individual traveler in order for them to receive the benefits of Priority Boarding.~pbTandC9|“Priority Boarding” must be displayed on your boarding pass in order to receive benefits.~pbTandC10|This offer is made at United’s discretion and is subject to change or termination at any time with or without notice to the customer.
PriorityBoardingOfferDetailsList: PbOfferDetailsText1|Get on board faster.~PbOfferDetailsText2|Don't stress about lining up. Enjoy boarding your flight immediately following our MileagePlus Premier members.
PremierAccessBenefitsList: Premier Access benefits include:|Priority boarding|Priority check-in line|Priority security line|See availability
PremierAccessTermsAndConditionsList: paTandC1|This Premier Access offer is nonrefundable and non-transferable~paTandC2|Voluntary changes to your itinerary may forfeit your Premier Access purchase and  any associated fees.~paTandC3|In the event of a flight cancellation or involuntary schedule change, we will refund  the fees paid for the unused Premier Access product upon request.~paTandC4|Premier Access is offered only on flights operated by United and United Express.~paTandC5|This Premier Access offer is processed based on availability at time of purchase.~paTandC6|Premier Access does not guarantee wait time in airport check-in, boarding, or security lines. Premier Access does not exempt passengers from check-in time limits.~paTandC7|Premier Access benefits apply only to the customer who purchased Premier Access  unless purchased for all customers on a reservation. Each travel companion must purchase Premier Access in order to receive benefits.~paTandC8|“Premier Access” must be printed or displayed on your boarding pass in order to  receive benefits.~paTandC9|This offer is made at United's discretion and is subject to change or termination  at any time with or without notice to the customer.

UpgradeCabinToolTipMsg: The amount of PlusPoints we deduct will be equal to the highest-priced upgrade you request. We’ll deduct this amount as soon as we confirm your first upgrade. Once you complete all flights in your upgrade request, we’ll refund the difference between what we deducted and the highest-priced upgrade you received, if applicable.
MilesMoneyReshopEligibility: Free cancellation available||Your Money + Miles reservation qualifies for free cancellation under our 24-hour flexible booking policy. If you want to change your itinerary, please cancel and rebook your reservation.
SSR_MealRestrictionMessage: Please note that the special meal you’ve requested will only be available on your flight(s) from {0}.
DOTBagRules: Baggage allowances and fees|United accepts one carry-on item of no more than 45 linear inches or 114 linear centimeters in the aircraft cabin, along with one personal item (such as a shoulder or laptop bag).| |In general, checked baggage fees are charged at any point in the itinerary where bags are checked. For itineraries operated exclusively by United or United Express, standard fees will apply to checked baggage with a maximum weight of 50 pounds (23 kg) per bag and a maximum outside linear dimension of 62 inches (157 cm) as follows:| |Within the U.S. (including Hawaii, Puerto Rico and the U.S .Virgin Islands) and between the U.S. and Canada: First checked bag $25, second checked bag $35|Between the U.S./Canada and the Caribbean: First checked bag $25, second checked bag $40|Between the U.S. and Mexico/Central America: First checked bag $0, second checked bag $40|Between the U.S. and Asia/Australia/New Zealand/Micronesia/Europe/Middle East/South America (except Brazil and Venezuela): First checked bag $0, second checked bag $70|Between the U.S. and Africa: First checked bag $0, second checked bag $70 (Fee applies only to/from Egypt/Malawi/Morocco/Zambia; all other African countries have a $0 second bag fee.)|Between the U.S. (except Hawaii) and Japan: First checked bag $0, second checked bag $0|Between Hawaii, Micronesia and Japan: First checked bag $0, second checked bag $40| |First and second checked bag fees do not apply to active-duty members of the U.S. military and their accompanying dependents, customers confirmed in United PolarisSM First, United First®, United PolarisSM Business or United Business®, or to United Global ServicesSM, MileagePlus® Premier® 1K®, Premier Platinum, Premier Gold or Star Alliance® Gold members, or Presidential PlusSM or MileagePlus Club primary credit cardholders. First checked bag fee does not apply to MileagePlus Premier Silver or Star Alliance Silver members, or MileagePlus Explorer or OnePassSM Plus primary credit cardholders.| |For additional information regarding checked baggage fees, allowances, weight/size restrictions, exceptions, embargoes, or overweight, oversized, odd-sized and sporting equipment charges, go to united.com/baggage and select your special items and restrictions category.| |For travel itineraries that include flights operated by our alliance partners or other airlines, different baggage fees may apply. Learn more at united.com/baggageservices.

CTNTooltipContent:
Header|Canadian Travel Number||Body|If you’re traveling to or from Canada and have the same or similar name as someone on Canada’s Secure Air Travel Act list, you may apply for a Canadian Travel Number, or CTN. A CTN will help reduce potential delays during check-in that result from this similarity.

For more information about Canadian Travel Numbers, please visit Public Safety Canada.
ValidationMsgCanadianTravelNumber: MINMAX13ALPHANUMERIC||Your CTN should be 13 alphanumeric characters. Symbols cannot be used.

PNRScheduleChangeChangeflights:
See options to make a one-time change at no cost
Select this option to search for other flights. You may have the option to make a one-time change at no cost if your new flight meets these conditions:
||
  • Your new travel date is not more than 1 day before or 1 day after the original date
  • Your departure and destination airports remain the same
  • Your new ticket is in the same cabin and fare class as the original ticket
  • Your new flight is operated by United or United Express

ManageResFFCNonOTAAgencyAlert: This reservation is already canceled.||Please contact the original ticketing agency to rebook your trip.
ManageResFFCResidualAlert: You have future flight credit.||Search travel credits
manageresfacecoveringmsgbodyText: Federal law requires all travelers to wear a face mask with no vents or openings that fully covers their nose and mouth.|Masks must be worn in the airport and during the entire flight, and between bites and sips if travelers are eating or drinking. This includes customer service counters and kiosks, airport lounges, gates and baggage claim areas. A face shield alone does not count as a face covering. Travelers who aren't wearing their masks in the airport or on board may be refused transport, be subject to fines, and could also lose their travel privileges on future United flights. Children younger than 2 years old are exempt.|
manageresfacecoveringmsgheader: Travelers are required to wear a face mask
manageresfacecoveringmsgbodyHtml: Federal law requires all travelers to wear a face mask with no vents or openings that fully covers their nose and mouth.<br/><br/>Masks must be worn in the airport and during the entire flight, and between bites and sips if travelers are eating or drinking. This includes customer service counters and kiosks, airport lounges, gates and baggage claim areas. A face shield alone does not count as a face covering. Travelers who aren't wearing their masks in the airport or on board may be refused transport, be subject to fines, and could also lose their travel privileges on future United flights. Children younger than 2 years old are exempt.<br/><br/><a href="https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/travelers/face-masks-public-transportation.html" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
manageresfacecoveringmsgbuttontext: What to expect when you fly >
GetUnitedClubDetailsByAirportGenericExce: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
PreOrderMealMealAvailableUnhandledErrorM: We’re unable to display meal information at this time.
PreOrderMealFooterDescription:
You can select your meal starting 5 days before your departure and up to 24 hours before your flight.

After you select your entree, we'll do our best to reserve it for your flight. We try to serve you the meal you chose, but we can't guarantee it since availability of meal options may change. If you choose a meal and then decide that you’d like something different, we’re happy to offer other meal options on board.

If your flight plans change, we’ll cancel your original order, and if you have a new flight that’s eligible and within the selection window, you’ll receive a new notification to choose a meal.
PreOrderMealFooterDescription_Html: You can select your meal starting 5 days before your departure and up to 24 hours before your flight.<br><br>After you select your entree, we'll do our best to reserve it for your flight. We try to serve you the meal you chose, but we can't guarantee it since availability of meal options may change. If you choose a meal and then decide that you’d like something different, we’re happy to offer other meal options on board.<br><br>If your flight plans change, we’ll cancel your original order, and if you have a new flight that’s eligible and within the selection window, you’ll receive a new notification to choose a meal.<br><br><a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/us/fly/travel/inflight/dining/preorder-meal.html'> Learn more about preorder meals > </a>
PreOrderMealAvailabilityErrorMessage: We can’t reserve this meal for you, but other meal options may be available on board and are subject to availability.
PreOrderMealSelectionFooterDescription: Once you save your meal, you won’t be able to change it, but we’ll have options on board if you change your mind.
PreOrderMealFlyThankingMessage: Thank you for flying with us. We hope you enjoyed your meal.
PreOrderMealSpecialMealDescription: We offer a variety of special meals on our flights to meet your dietary needs. See our <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/us/fly/travel/inflight/dining/special.html'>special meals</a> page for more information.

ChangeEligiblieBulkAlertMessage: This reservation is not eligible to be changed by United. Please check with the ticketing agency for change options.
PartiallyFlownPolicyMessage: Use your confirmation number to return to this canceled reservation in My trips and make changes for a future trip. Any residual value for the partially used non-refundable ticket will be applied when you change your itinerary. Change fees will apply.
PartiallyFlownPolicyHeaderMessage: Any residual value of a partially used, non-refundable ticket will be applied at the time of use.
ManualRefundPolicyMessage: Once our agent processes your refund, we will confirm the transaction via email. We typically process manual refunds within 10 business days, but please allow up to 30. We appreciate your patience.
ManualRefundPolicyHeaderMessage: A billing agent needs to manually process your refund.
BasicEconomyNonRefundMessage: A Basic Economy ticket has no value if canceled, unless a travel waiver is in effect which will credit the value of the ticket towards a future flight. Otherwise, the price of a ticket cannot be credited towards your original form of payment or a future flight purchase.
BasicEconomyNonRefundHeadMessage: Basic Economy tickets cannot be refunded
CancelRedepositPolicyMessage: Your redeposit fee has been waived based on your membership status level.
Refund-24HourFlexibleBookingPolicyMessag: You're eligible to cancel without paying a fee under our 24-hour flexible booking policy.
Refund-FutureFlightCreditMessage: This credit can be used towards a future flight. Change fees may apply for international flights originating outside of the United States.
Refund-BasicEconomyNonRefundable: Basic Economy tickets are not eligible for future flight credit or refunds.
Refund-FarelockMessage: If your've opted to autopurchase a ticket at time of your Farelock's expiration, canceling this reservation will also cancel your autopurchase instructions.

MyCheckedBagServiceChargesDesc: Checked baggage service charges are collected at any point in the itinerary where bags are checked. The bag service charges above reflect a maximum outside linear dimension of 62 inches (157 cm). Baggage service charges are per traveler as listed above.
